to avoid the message about password file protection, I couldn't simply set =
the file as read only. after right click on it and select the properties op=
tion, I had to go to the security tab (which appear only if you have unchec=
k "use simple file sharing" in "tools/folder options/view" of an explorer w=
indow)
when in the security tab, I suppressed all other access than my own =
account. after that, I didn't had the error message again.

I still had ano=
ther problem. the crawl did start but stayed blocked. I've found some error=
 messages in the logs: 
Failed to get host xxx.yyy.zz address from ServerCa=
che
after having created a directory "conf\profiles" I created a new profil=
e from default and it finaly worked.
I still don't know why when I create a=
 new job, it doesn't have any default parameter it has on a Linux version.
=

hope this will help.
 jp
